description:
AVENUE GROUND (as per report)	
252	Cherry Laurel (Prunus laurocerasus)	Reduce height to same level as eves. Reduce spread over alley way. Reduce spread over property behind large  wall. Retain spread along alley way as screening. Work is to try and formalise high hedge / screening effect between properties - Final height = 6m and final spread = 3m.	

272	English Oak (Quercus robur)	25% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2m, retain furnishing growth - Final height = 16m and final spread = 12m.		
	
289	London plane (Platanus Ã— hispanica)	20% end weight reduction of mid and lower crown limbs. Final height = unchanged at 24m and final spread = unchanged at 18m.	 

no number	Bay (Laurus nobilis)	Near Hawthorn 323, rear garden of 43 The Avenue - 2 x trees - Reduce about 2m all round.                         Final height = 6m and final spread = 4m.
decision_conditions: Please confirm the address of the trees within this application.
